name: Indie Tennis
description:
Indie Tennis sport game of Indiesoft

Indie Tennis is undoubtedly a very special game, is a very fun game to play and have a good time with friends and family.

We create our player to try to beat our friends or the computer itself, so we can climb in the rankings, and in the way have fun trying to make things difficult to refere and the ball boy. .

This game is a cute parody of a low-cost tennis championship, where at the moment there's only one tennis ball to play the whole game, and the ballboy does all he can for the game to develop normally, encouraged or booed by the audience. Of course, you'll see this is a game far from normal.

Currently, this game is available in demo version, where we can play all the time as we want, but the referee counts the points as he wants, and we can only play singleplayer.
#arcade #sports
